url: Find the Index of the First Occurrence in a String

examples:
Input:haystack = "sadbutsad", needle = "sad"Output:0Explanation:"sad" occurs at index 0 and 6.
The first occurrence is at index 0, so we return 0.
Input:haystack = "leetcode", needle = "leeto"Output:-1Explanation:"leeto" did not occur in "leetcode", so we return -1.
constraints: haystackandneedleconsist of only lowercase English characters.
data.problem_statement: Given two stringsneedleandhaystack, return the index of the first occurrence ofneedleinhaystack, or-1ifneedleis not part ofhaystack.
data.title: Find the Index of the First Occurrence in a String
